title: Portable Windowed Starcraft
description:
Starcraft & Starcraft: Brood War able to run without installation and in a window using Chaos Launcher. Simply download and run ChaosLauncher.exe and Starcraft should start up. Select a game mode and the version you wish to play, and off you go!

The CD key has been banned, so this will only work in Single Player. To play online, you'll need to change your key with a tool such as this: 
http://www.icyhell.net/2008/04/05/starcraft-cd-key-changer/

I'll probably include it in my next upload of this if I find the energy
